14.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005

24.01.2008 SH SCR13280 Added BAD700 to book stock changes

08.02.2007 SH SCR12287 New Scan: Removed test on v.TEXT is mandatory

21.11.2006 SH SCR12108 Added BAD702.PI.VALUEDATE = GNRL_ACTIVEDATE

extended button OK handling with charging change commission if only text is

... load LCHD/CLHI database fields
-- Button Archive
-- Button New scan
-- Button New file
-- Button OK: Save LCHI after changes
.. if one of the detail buttons is activated ("Archive" until "New scan") then
one of these subprograms has to be called if the database updates are
performed
... uses normal edit controls (alpha 20000), instead of RFT controls for
Blob field, to avoid problems with spec. charaters in case of using
copy/past from e.g. MS Word
-- Check and store changes
-- An error occured, return to screen
-- else go on to store changes to database
-- Check for changes, made by user
-- If user changed something on screen, ask to save changes
